title: Justice Department Recently Looked Into Twitter, Lawsuit Says
description: The focus of the inquiry was unclear, but several former executives said they had racked up more than $1 million in expenses dealing with it and other legal issues.

title: A.I. Is Coming for Lawyers, Again
description: Previous advances in A.I. inspired predictions that the law was the lucrative profession most likely to suffer job losses. It didn’t happen. Is this time different?

title: The Real-World Costs of the Digital Race for Bitcoin
description: Bitcoin mines cash in on electricity — by devouring it, selling it, even turning it off — and they cause immense pollution. In many cases, the public pays a price.
